post:
** FAST 3 HOUR SETUP ON MOST VPS**

You asked and now we have relaunched! Due to many requests we have re opened our US based VPS servers. ip - 72.9.153.70

SPECIAL PRICING BELOW - DONT MISS OUT THEY WONT LAST LONG!
Did you know we can price match? We will try and match any genuine vps pricing from competitors - contact us for quotes.

Based in Colo4Dallas in Dallas, TX. - we are pleased to offer the following VPS. All VPS come with a web based control panel allowing control to restart VPS , configure backups, web based SSH client, process monitoring, port monitoring and much more!

All VPS are using OpenVZ and come with two ips as standard. Servers are powerful Athlon 4000 with plenty ram, raid storage and prices inc vat. Please email sales@wisehosting.co.uk or brian@wisehosting.co.uk for more info or for a custom quote. We can also offer lxadmin, choice of OS and many more options, please contact us with your requests.

$12 month - Vps with 128mb ram | 256mb burst | 5gb disk and 150gb bandwidth -
http://my.wisehosting.co.uk/signup.php?package=142&currency=usd

http://my.wisehosting.co.uk/signup.php?package=143&currency=usd

http://my.wisehosting.co.uk/signup.php?package=140&currency=usd

$50 month - Direct Admin VPS with 512mb ram | 1gb burst| 20gb disk and 600gb bandwidth -
http://my.wisehosting.co.uk/signup.php?package=141&currency=usd

START YOUR OWN VPS HOSTING WITH THIS READY TO GO SERVER!

UK - ?150 month - Starter vps hosting server with Dual Core 2.8 with 2GB ram | 2 x 160gb disk mirrored | installed with hypervm and OS images - ready to start hosting vps!
CONTACT US NOW FOR STOCK!

US - $230 month - Power vps hosting server Athlon 4000 / 4gb ram / 2 x 160gb disk installed with hypervm and OS images - ready to start hosting VPS! Please contact sales for this server as limited amount only in stock

- CPU is equal fair share use
- burst ram is double the guaranteed
- yes, we can offer lxadmin and lxadmin-host-in-a-box
- We do not do plesk
- Contracts are monthly / no commitment
- OS reloads are free and you can actually do it yourself through our web based panel!
- the offer is limited and is subject to the first 20 orders due to the fact we do not oversell our servers. After this we will take pre-orders.
- IP to trace would be 72.9.153.70
- these VPS are not resold, ie we host / configure these ourselves and do not buy and markup from other companies

Although not entirely ready - http://www.wisevps.com will be the offical vps sales website
